post.body: DJ Blue's old hood! When was the last time you heard from that guy?
That site you posted is like the "temptation island" of social media.
Trash interwebs! Bring it on, bring it on, bring it on!
that means Stone Cold is gonna come stun you!
wow what a pain in the ass! I'm pretty sure you can contest it and win though, since you didn't break any laws.
oh fuck you're getting it already?! Gotta roll out to berdo and drink man!
what phone did you get?
Check the temps in hell, cuz the Halos just signed Brian Fuentes! Nice to have a solid, hometown arm in our bullpen.
Wow monica has the same birthday as labron james!
Sushi om nom nom nom nom...
tea without sugar is pretty effin good. and it sure is mighty relaxing before bed.
Happy birthday Monica! Here's to another year of tormenting the world with your odeur! Jk, love you babe.
I'm effin starving. I'm about | | that close to ordering a pizza for myself.
My man-boobs are sore.
Researching the Art Deco movement for a logo design.
FUCK. I FORGOT TO BACKUP MY FONT COLLECTION BEFORE I MIGRATED TO MY NEW MAC. I AM A ROYAL FUCKUP.
haha, I have 4700+ rollover minutes. Guess I'm more of a net-whore than a phone-slut.
Slicing up Golde's web page. Keep an eye on www.chrisgolde.com for the next couple of weeks as I mark that bitch up.
I really don't want to work out in the 50-degree weather, but I know I probably should if I have any real desire to bust this belly.
My first brew is now sitting in the fermenting keg. Two (2) gallons of fresh home-brewed beer will be served at my pad in one month's time!
